Package org.svvrl.goal.core.layout

Class SALayout

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.AbstractLayout
org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.SALayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
Layout
public class SALayout
extends AbstractLayout
This class provides an implementation of the SA layout [Ron Davidson, David Harel: Drawing Graphs Nicely Using Simulated Annealing. ACM Trans. Graph. 15(4): 301-331, 1996].
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    (package private) class  SALayout.SAImpl
    This is the real implementation of the SA layout.

    The initial temperature.
    static java.lang.String SALayoutLengthWithRespectToWindowKey
    Indicates if the area available for the graph is calculated based on the window size or node size.

    The maximal number of iterations.
    static java.lang.String SALayoutMaxRadiusKey
    The maximal radius of moving a node.
    static java.lang.String SALayoutMinAngleKey
    Blames edges that have nodes in common if the angle is smaller than the give amount.

    The multiplier of the minimal node-edge distance in the cost function.

    The decrement of the radius.

    The interval of iterations for decreasing the radius.

    • SALayoutMinAngleKey

      public static final java.lang.String SALayoutMinAngleKey
      Blames edges that have nodes in common if the angle is smaller than the give amount. This is used in calculating edge crossing in the cost function.

  • Method Details

    • layout

      public void layout​(Graph g, java.awt.Rectangle r, AlgorithmListener l)
      Description copied from interface: Layout
      Lay out a specified graph by this layout algorithm.
      Parameters:
      g - a graph to be laid out
      r - an area available for the graph g
      l - a listener that is interested in the progress of the layout
